ok.

Well, I do run test and train data through the same part of the graph. Not sure what you're getting at, maybe I'm on the wrong track here, but I want to calculate the accuracy for training batches and for the test set (so same graph, different input) und plot these, so I have to use separate scalar summaries for that right?
